description: Enterprise techniques used by Ebury, ATT&CK software S0377 v1.0
name: Ebury (S0377)

techniques.comment: Ebury has installed a self-signed RPM package mimicking the original system package on RPM based systems.
Ebury has used UDP port 53 for C2.
Ebury has encrypted C2 traffic using the client IP address, then encoded it as a hexadecimal string.
Ebury has disabled logging when the backdoor is used.
Ebury has used a DGA to generate a domain name for C2.
Ebury has obfuscated its strings with a simple XOR encryption with a static key.
Ebury has intercepted unencrypted private keys as well as private key pass-phrases.
Ebury has hijacked the OpenSSH process by injecting into the existing session as opposed to creating a new session.
Ebury has used DNS requests over UDP port 53.
